mapper.delete:
delete from ibms_dev_collection_record where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(collection_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as `date` ,SUM(`value`) as electricity from ibms_dev_collection_record where attr_id = 4 and DATE_FORMAT(collection_date, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') group by DATE_FORMAT(collection_date, '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(`value`),0) AS yesterday FROM ibms_dev_collection_record WHERE attr_id = 4 AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(collection_date) = 1
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(`value`),0) AS lastMonth FROM ibms_dev_collection_record WHERE attr_id = 4 AND PERIOD_DIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m'), DATE_FORMAT(collection_date,'%Y%m')) =1
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(`value`),0) AS currentMonth FROM ibms_dev_collection_record WHERE attr_id = 4 AND DATE_FORMAT(collection_date, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m')

SELECT a.id,a.floor_name AS floorName,temperature,humidity,ppm FROM (SELECT t1.id,floor_name,t3.VALUE AS temperature FROM base_floor t1 LEFT JOIN base_device_info t2 ON t1.location_id = t2.location_id LEFT JOIN ibms_dev_collection_record t3 ON t2.id = t3.device_id WHERE t2.device_type_id = 1 AND t3.attr_id = 1 )a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.id,floor_name,t3.value as humidity FROM base_floor t1 LEFT JOIN base_device_info t2 ON t1.location_id = t2.location_id LEFT JOIN ibms_dev_collection_record t3 ON t2.id = t3.device_id WHERE t2.device_type_id = 1 AND t3.attr_id = 2) b ON a.id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.id,floor_name,t3.value AS ppm FROM base_floor t1 LEFT JOIN base_device_info t2 ON t1.location_id = t2.location_id LEFT JOIN ibms_dev_collection_record t3 ON t2.id = t3.device_id WHERE t2.device_type_id = 1 AND t3.attr_id = 3) c ON a.id = c.id
